      • createCSVElement

        public static org.jdom2.Element createCSVElement(java.util.List<StockEvolution> se,
                                                 java.lang.String sack)
                                          throws org.jdom2.JDOMException,
                                                 java.io.IOException
        transforms a list of stock evolution data with a stock analysis control key into an org.jdom2.element with a csv-file embedded.
        Parameters:
        se - list of stock evolution data
        sack - stock analysis control key
        Returns:
        sackXML org.jdom2.element holding the data as csv
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - exception while reading file
        org.jdom2.JDOMException - exception while parsing file to JDOM object

      • filterSEList

        public static java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,java.util.List<StockEvolution>> filterSEList(java.util.List<StockEvolution> se,
                                                                                                java.lang.String sack)
                                                                                         throws org.jdom2.JDOMException,
                                                                                                java.io.IOException
        filters a list of stock evolution data with according to a stock analysis control key.
        Parameters:
        se - list of stock evolution data
        sack - stock analysis control key
        Returns:
        filteredSe hash table containing the individual groups
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - exception while reading file
        org.jdom2.JDOMException - exception while parsing file to JDOM object
